pkgmetadata.longdescription: HitchTest=========HitchTest is the main hitch plugin containing all of the core componentsrequired to run a test.It is installed into every .hitch virtualenv by the `bootstrapper <https://github.com/hitchtest/hitch>`_.Documentation-------------* `Full hitch documentation <https://hitchtest.readthedocs.org/en/latest/>`_* `hitchtest-specific API docs <https://hitchtest.readthedocs.org/en/latest/api/>`_
